DOC.brief_summary: This will be a prospective, multi-center, randomized, single blind study to collect and evaluate post-market clinical data on the SprayShield Adhesion Barrier System as an adjuvant to good surgical technique for the reduction of postoperative adhesion formation following major open abdominal surgery.
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation of SprayShield in Reducing Post-Operative Adhesion Formation Following Major Open Abdominal Surgery
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of ulcerative colitis or familial polyposis and require twostage surgery for treatment of either of these disorders will be eligible
